description.first: Hi! Welcome to my site, where you can learn about Web, App and software development. I welcome you to accept my challenge: Study every day , at least 10 minutes. Do NOT stop learning about tecnology, life, arts, languages, anything that you like.
description.second: Face your fears! Learning keeps us young, it makes us see the universe in a new perspective and fall in love. Are you ready to learn and change your life?
